label: AB2C7D2_mC48_15_a_f_e3f_f-001
title: $\beta$-Na$_{2}$CuP$_{2}$O$_{7}$ Structure
comments:
Na$_{2}$CuP$_{2}$O$_{7}$ exists in two forms (Erragh, 1995): \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C7D2_mP48_14_e_2e_7e_2e-001}{Light blue $\alpha$-Na$_{2}$CuP$_{2}$O$_{7}$} is stable up to 843K. \item Above 843K it transforms into \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C7D2_mC48_15_a_f_e3f_f-001}{dark blue $\beta$-Na$_{2}$CuP$_{2}$O$_{7}$}, which is metastable at room temperature. \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 We use the data taken at 295K.
